title: Eat4Fun Animos Collection Kids Fork, Bear
features: A friendly face on the front and a funny tail on the back side of the durable ABS plastic handle
Dishwasher safe for easy care--Xtra Wash technology guarantees 500 dishwashing cycles to ensure that colors will not fade over time
High quality 18/10 stainless steel. Mirror polished for a long lasting bright shine
CPSIA (Consumer Product Safety Improvement Act) tested and approved
description: Kids love eating with these favorite animal characters. Breakfast, lunch, or dinner--you'll get a smile every time! Choose from our 8 funny friends, or better yet, take them all! Guaranteed to delight with each and every bite. A friendly face on the front and a funny tail on the back side of the durable abs plastic handle. 6-1/8 inches tall by 3/4 inch wide. High quality 18/10 stainless steel. Mirror polished for a long-lasting bright shine. No BPA or phthalates. CPSIA (consumer product safety improvement act) tested and approved. Dishwasher safe for easy care--Xtra Wash technology guarantees 500 dishwashing cycles to ensure that colors will not fade over time. Includes 1 Fork.
